Package eu.geclipse.core

Interface Summary
IApplicationDeployment  
IBidirectionalConnection Interface for bidirectional connections.
IProblem Base interface of g-Eclipse's problem reporting mechanism.
IProblemProvider A problem provider maps unique IDs for problems to concrete implementations of the IProblem interface.
ISolution Solutions are thought to give the user a hint how to solve a problem in the context of the g-Eclipse problem reporting mechanism.
 

Class Summary
AbstractProblem Abstract implementation of the IProblem interface.
CoreProblems Problem provider implementation for core related problems.
ExtensionManager This class provides some helper methods to easily access extension points, related configuration elements and executable extensions.
Extensions This is a helper class that holds static fields and methods to easily access extension of the g-Eclipse core extension points.
GridJobStatusServiceFactoryManager Class fog managin of GridJobStatusServiceFactories.
JobOutputsDownloader Job, which downloads from grid output files for submitted job
JobStatusUpdater The class for updating job status in the background.
Messages Returns the localised messages for this package.
Preferences This class gives easy access to the core preferences of g-Eclipse.
ProblemRegistry This is the base problem registry that is always used if no other problem registry is specified.
Solution Concrete implementation of the ISolution interface.
SolutionRegistry This class is the central repository for core related solutions.
 

Exception Summary
GridException Base class of all Grid exceptions.
